rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with storage area for shoes and coats. The design adheres to Vastu principles by positioning the main entrance in the south-east corner, enhancing positive energy flow.

An industrial-style open-plan kitchen merged with a living area featuring exposed brick and ductwork for an authentic look. The layout includes modern appliances, ample natural light from large windows, and an ergonomic design to support daily activities.
Largest bedroom placed in the north-west direction to promote calmness and privacy. It features built-in wardrobes, a walk-in closet, and a small ensuite bathroom for convenience.
A comfortable secondary bedroom located adjacent to the master bedroom in accordance with Vastu guidelines for family cohesiveness. It includes built-in storage solutions.
Dedicated entertainment space featuring soundproof walls, ambient lighting, and acoustic design. The room is placed in the north-east direction to foster concentration and relaxation.
A quiet library area with built-in bookshelves and reading nooks integrated into a corner of the living space. Positioned for tranquility, it also doubles as a study room.

openings.description: Large entry door with a welcoming vestibule designed to balance Vastu energy and industrial aesthetic.
Floor-to-ceiling window in the living area providing abundant natural light and enhancing the open-plan layout.
Industrial-style window that allows fresh air into the kitchen while maintaining aesthetic continuity with the rest of the ground floor.
